DOC.brief_summary: SHARE : Simple HAART Abacavir , Reyataz , Epivir
DOC.brief_title: SHARE : Simple HAART With Abacavir , Reyataz , Epivir
DOC.detailed_description: Open-label , multicenter study ABC/3TC + ATV subject complete least 24 week treatment ABC/3TC+ATV/RTV first line regimen plasma HIV-1 RNA < 50 copies/mL entry
DOC.criteria: Currently take abacavir/lamivudine ( Epzicom ) combination atazanavir ( Reyataz ) boost ritonavir ( Norvir ) first antiretroviral regimen Viral load < 50 copies/ml Viral load > 50 copies/ml Having take one antiretroviral regimen
